title: Brief-Cope
instructions: Please rate the degree to which each statement applies to you or your current situation, using the given scale.

questions.instructions: I've been concentrating my efforts on doing something about the situation I'm in.
questions.left: I haven't been doing this at all
questions.right: I've been doing this a lot

questions.instructions: I've been taking action to try to make the situation better.
questions.left: I haven't been doing this at all
questions.right: I've been doing this a lot

questions.right: I've been doing this a lot
